title: Boards "Discussion View" not sorting by comment vote-level
body:
Hi, this just started today.  When I load a non-GD thread, the posts seem to be rather randomly arranged when set to discussion view.  While they used to sort by highest to lowest vote-level, it just seems totally random now, often with replies with a single upvote and no replies of their own appearing at the top.

Thanks for any help (or explanation) that is provided.

replies.body: Y'know....I hadn't actually paid attention to how they were organized in discussion view, you're talking about replies within a thread right? I'm pretty sure they were always listed by time of response, with the replies nested in the same time of reply order. I'm not sure they were ever arranged by votes, but could definitely be wrong! (This broporo has only been around a little less than a year ^_^)

Mine at least used to work the way I mentioned, though I've had tons of issues with the boards unique to myself (one of which I've completely given up on solving at this point) in my 4+ years on the boards).

I guess I'll see how this goes for the next couple days, though it was helpful to see what the prevailing opinion on the boards was (because if I disagree, I like to argue my case).  If it remains an issue, I'll probably just open a support ticket and see what can be done (unless I was enjoying a bug up until now xD).
